metadata.title: USN-4779-1 -- Gettext vulnerability
metadata.description: Danilo Segan discovered that Gettext mishandled certain input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4779-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  php-gettext - 1.0.11-2ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
